favourite.article:
O Lord, do capture every thought, Your mind in ours would be in wrought; Grant us to see Your economy Until that glorious day, dear Lord, When You'd be all we see.
SAINTS! This must be our prayer day by day.
Behold, I have come to do Your will, O God. (Hebrews 10:7) May the Lord make our heart a duplicate of His heart.
